tagline: An Act to repeal the President’s Order No. 15 of 1980

PART I
Acts, Ordinances, President’s Orders and Regulations
SENATE SECRETARIAT
Islamabad, the 21st February, 2020
No. F. 9 (11
)/2020-Legis.—
The following Act of Majlis-e-Shoora
(Parliament) received the assent of the President on 18th February, 2020 and is
hereby published for general information:—
A
CT
 N
O
. VIII 
OF
 2020
An Act to repeal the President’ s Order No. 15 of 1980
W
HEREAS
 it is expedient to repeal the Superior Courts (Court Dress and
Mode of Address) Order, 1980 (P.O. No. 15 of 1980);
It is hereby enacted as follows:—
1.
Short title and commencement.— 
(1) This Act may be called the
Superior Courts (Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order (Repeal) Act, 2020
.
(73)
Price : Rs. 5:00
[5197(2020)/Ex. Gaz.]
74
THE  GAZETTE  OF  PAKISTAN,  EXTRA.,  FEBRUARY  22,  2020
      
 [P
AR
T
 I
(2)
It shall come into force at once.
2.
Repeal of President’s Order No. 15 of 1980.—
The Superior
Courts (Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order, 1980 (P.O. No. 15 of 1980), is
hereby repealed.
MAJOR (R) SYED HASNAIN HAIDER,
Acting Secretary.
PRINTED  BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF  PAKISTAN PRESS,  ISLAMABAD.
PUBLISHED BY THE  DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD, KARACHI.
